hymn.title: The Lord knows all that frustrates you
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Knowing

layout.singingstanza: The Lord knows all that frus -- trates you! He knows your ev -- ery weak -- ness, too. The se -- crets you could nev -- er tell! The Lord's word says: I know it well.

lyrics.stanza: The Lord knows all that frustrates you! He knows your every weakness, too. The secrets you could never tell! The Lord's word says: I know it well.
He knows how hard the trials you face, He knows how much you need His grace, He foreknew all that happens here, He is your Lord, why doubt or fear.
Trust all your burdens to the Lord, Pour out to Him your sighing, too; His heart of love your sorrow knows, He'll grant His grace, He'll see you through.
If but He knows, my heart's assuaged; If but He knows, My joy's restored. If but He knows, He'll surely save. If but He knows, What need I more?
